docs.text: monarch-documentation-schema Technical documentation for all Monarch applications, packages, services and related projects. URI: https://w3id.org/monarch-initiative/monarch-technical-documentation Name: monarch-documentation-schema Classes Class Description Resource A generic grouping for any identifiable entity ResourceCollection A holder for Resource objects Slots Slot Description description A human-readable description for a resource entries id A unique identifier for a resource name A human-readable name for a resource Enumerations Enumeration Description Types Type Description xsd:boolean A binary (true or false) value xsd:date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar linkml:DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime xsd:dateTime The combination of a date and time xsd:decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... xsd:double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification xsd:float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification xsd:integer An integer xsd:string Prefix part of CURIE shex:nonLiteral A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model shex:iri A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model xsd:string A character string xsd:dateTime A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... xsd:anyURI a complete URI xsd:anyURI a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description
